attributes.action: Make one way system seven drive and place speed bumps on duddle lane
attributes.additional_details: Duddle lane is the main road then leads to a primary school on Severn drive.
attributes.background: The road from severn drive to exit onto duddle lane is a hazard. The speed people come down duddle lane when it is a busy crossing for adults and children on their way to school is very dangerous. After a fatal road traffic accident recently it's time something was done to ensure safety to everyone.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
